dataTemplate.name: XXPASCOA
dataTemplate.description: OD PB SC Overdue Audit Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: select od_sc_vendor_number, od_sc_vendor_name, od_sc_vend_type, od_sc_vendor_status, od_sc_activation_date, OD_SC_REACTIVATE_DATE, od_sc_audit_agent, od_sc_vend_address, od_sc_factory_number, od_sc_factory_name, od_sc_factory_address, od_sc_europe_rgn, od_sc_mexico_region, od_sc_asia_region, od_sc_department, od_sc_merchant, od_sc_audit_required, OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER, OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D, OD_SC_VEND_REGION, OD_SC_STRAUDT_REQ_D, OD_SC_PAYMENT_RETAINER, OD_SC_VENDPAY_RCVD_D, OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D, OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE, OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT from Q_OD_PB_SC_VENDOR_MASTER_V where od_sc_vendor_status='Active' and OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D is null and OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE<sysdate AND NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X')=NVL(:p_agent,NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_merchant,'X')=NVL(:p_merchant,NVL(od_sc_merchant,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_vend_region,'X')=NVL(:p_us_rgn,NVL(od_sc_vend_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_europe_rgn,'X')=NVL(:p_eu_rgn,NVL(od_sc_europe_rgn,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_mexico_region,'X')=NVL(:p_mx_rgn,NVL(od_sc_mexico_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_asia_region,'X')=NVL(:p_as_rgn,NVL(od_sc_asia_region,'X')) ORDER BY 1,2
